Name: Repealing a provision which precludes judgments entered for sanitation violations from being referred to city marshals for execution.
Title: A Local Law to amend the New York city charter, in relation to repealing a provision which precludes judgments entered for sanitation violations from being referred to city marshals for execution.
BodyName: Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Sanitation and Solid Waste Management

Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:

	Section 1. Subparagraph j of paragraph 1 of subdivision d of section 1049-a of the New York city charter is REPEALED.
	ï¿½ 2. This local law shall take effect immediately.
